full_description:
Xiaomi Mi LYEJ05LM Mini Bluetooth Single Ear Earbuds

The Xiaomi Mi LYEJ05LM Mini Bluetooth Single Ear Earbuds transport you to a world of unsurpassed music quality. These earphones, designed with painstaking attention to detail, push the limits of portable sound technology. They embody the notion of lightweight comfort, with a small body design that makes you feel almost weightless when listening to your favorite music or podcasts. The ergonomic in-ear design of Xiaomi Mi LYEJ05LM is more than simply comfortable; it's a statement of dependability, providing a snug fit that stays in place no matter how busy your lifestyle. There's no need to worry about sweat or rain with the IPX4 waterproof rating of Xiaomi Mi LYEJ05LM, which allows you to listen to music without interruption throughout tough workouts or outdoor activities. The one-button multi-operation capability makes navigating your audio experience easy, placing control at your fingertips with intuitive simplicity. The magnetic pogo pin design makes charging easy, ensuring both safety and convenience in one streamlined package. However, it is more than simply convenience; it is also about communication. The Xiaomi Mi LYEJ05LM earbuds have a MEMS silicone microphone that ensures your voice is heard clearly even in noisy environments, making every conversation a breeze. It's the audio quality that actually distinguishes these earphones. With a 7.2mm strong magnet moving coil unit, they provide a rich, immersive sound experience that brings your music to life. From the strong voices to the deep, resonant drumbeats, each note is portrayed with precision and clarity, taking your listening experience to new heights. Bluetooth 4.1 technology and the CSR 8610 chip improve compatibility and stability, providing flawless communication even in the presence of 4G networks. Prepare to go on a voyage of aural ecstasy with the Xiaomi Mi LYEJ05LM Mini Bluetooth Earbuds, where every moment is a symphony of sound.

full_description:
Xiaomi Redmi Buds 5 ANC True Wireless Earbuds

The Xiaomi Redmi Buds 5 are an excellent addition to the category of truly wireless earbuds. These TWS earbuds have the most recent Bluetooth V5.3 chip, ensuring a stable and efficient wireless connection with your devices. The sophisticated chipset provides increased connection and energy efficiency, allowing you to enjoy prolonged usage without the need for regular recharging. The Xiaomi Redmi Buds 5 stand out for their remarkable noise-cancelling capabilities. These Redmi Buds 5 earbuds use cutting-edge technology to suppress ambient noise by up to 46 decibels, giving you a peaceful and undisturbed listening experience even during hectic commutes or crowded office situations. These Redmi Buds 5 earbuds provide excellent audio quality. The Xiaomi Redmi Buds 5 include a big 12.4mm dynamic driver with a moving coil architecture and produce amazing sound quality. Immerse yourself in rich, immersive music with deep bass, clean mids, and sharp highs, guaranteeing an exceptional listening experience each time. These Buds 5 earbuds allow you to tailor your audio experience with four distinct EQ sound profiles. Whether you want more bass, a balanced audio output, or a sound profile suited to your music or activities, the Xiaomi Redmi Buds 5 have you covered. But the quality doesn't end there; with AI Call technology, these earbuds provide crystal-clear and natural speech transmission during phone conversations, even in tough circumstances. Whether it's work-related calls or personal talks, the Xiaomi Redmi Buds 5 are the ideal partner for remaining connected with clarity and ease.

Up to 46dB Wide ANC

The Redmi Buds 5 have a noise reduction depth of up to 46dB*, making them excellent for reducing low-frequency noise in aircraft cabins or on subways. Put them in and enjoy your own place.

2-microphone AI-based ANC For Calls

The Redmi Buds 5 uses a self-developed dual-channel AI system to withstand noise created by a 6m/s wind. The two microphones work together to precisely extract speech sounds and filter out extraneous noise, giving the impression that you're speaking with the person on the phone face to face.

Ultra-large Driver With Titanium Diaphragm

The 12.4mm big dynamic driver of Redmi Buds 5 allows for a wider vibration area and deeper rhythms, while the robust and strong titanium-plated diaphragm delivers cleaner treble performance. Listen to the string squeaks and breathes between phrases; superb acoustics bring the music to life.

A Vast Soundstage

The Redmi Buds 5's separate sound chamber provides great dynamic frequency response and sound constancy, resulting in a more realistic and immersive experience with discrete layers of high, mid, and low frequency sounds.

Classic Earbuds Design For a Snug Fit

Classic design with a modern twist. The Redmi Buds 5 are optimized utilizing data modeling of hundreds of ear canal models to provide a solid fit while remaining comfortable. Redmi Buds 5 has a 65:35 inner and outer weight distribution, which allows for a better fit.

Buy Xiaomi Redmi Buds 5 ANC True Wireless Earbuds from Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get the original Xiaomi Redmi Buds 5 ANC True Wireless Earbuds from Star Tech. We have a large collection of the latest XIAOMI Earbuds to purchase. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech shop to get yours at the lowest price. The Xiaomi Redmi Buds 5 ANC True Wireless Earbuds come with 6 months warranty.

full_description:
XIAOMI Redmi Buds 4 Active True Wireless Earbuds

The XIAOMI Redmi Buds 4 Active True Wireless Earbuds are equipped with advanced Bluetooth 5.3 for a stable connection. They feature a 12mm dynamic driver that delivers powerful bass and enhanced acoustics. The earbuds have noise cancellation for clear calls. The earbuds support low-latency mode for a smooth gaming experience and offer convenient touch control operations. They are compatible with Google Fast Pair for quick connection to Android devices. The earbuds are water-resistant with an IPX4 rating.

12mm Dynamic Driver

The XIAOMI Redmi Buds 4 Active is equipped with a 12mm dynamic driver and delivers powerful bass and heightened acoustics. Expertly tuned by the Xiaomi Acoustic Lab, these earbuds provide a pleasing listening experience for users worldwide, immersing you in the richness of your favorite music.

Noise Cancellation for Calls

The Redmi Buds 4 Active features a high-sensitivity microphone that effectively mitigates ambient noise, ensuring optimal clarity of speech. Whether you're in a busy environment or on the move, these earbuds enable clear communication.

28-hour Ultra Long Battery Life

XIAOMI Redmi Buds 4 Active offers an impressive battery life, providing up to 5 hours of continuous listening on a single charge. With the portable charging case, you can extend the usage to an impressive 28 hours, allowing you to enjoy great music day and night without worrying about recharging frequently.

Fast Charging Support

Redmi Buds 4 Active allows you to quickly charge them for just 10 minutes and enjoy up to 110 minutes of music playback. This feature ensures you can take short breaks and get right back into your music journey without any significant interruptions.

Smooth Gaming Experience with Low-Latency Mode

Bluetooth 5.3 technology of the Redmi Buds 4 Active enables low-latency mode for a smooth gaming experience with exceptional precision. With reduced lag, you can enjoy immersive gaming sessions and stay in control with accurate and timely responses.

Convenient Touch Control

Controlling your earbuds is made easy with touch control operations. With light touches, you can effortlessly switch between different modes, skip to the next track, play/pause music, answer or reject calls, and more. The Redmi Buds 4 Active give you complete control from anywhere.

Google Fast Pair

The Redmi Buds 4 Active support Google Fast Pair by simply opening the cover, allowing for simple Bluetooth pairing with your Android devices. With a single tap, you can connect and even locate your misplaced earbuds.

IPX4 water-resistance

The Redmi Buds 4 Active feature an IPX4 water-resistant design that has passed rigorous testing. Whether you're outdoors or hitting the gym, these earbuds can handle your active lifestyle, providing reliable performance even in the face of sweat or light rain.

Low Latency Touch Control

title: Xiaomi Mi TWSEJ07LS Basic 2S True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds Black
cat_seo_title: Xiaomi Earbuds Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Xiaomi Earbuds at the best price in Bangladesh. Latest Xiaomi Mi TWS True Wireless Earbuds available at Star Tech Shop. Order Xiaomi Earbuds online to get delivery in BD.
full_description:
Xiaomi Mi TWSEJ07LS Basic 2S True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds Black

In terms of design, the Mi TWS Earbuds Basic 2S havenâ€™t changed too much. We still have here an Earbud design completely wrapped in black. Only the back, where the button is usually located, is now a glossy touch surface. Not much actually changes in terms of weight, they are said to weigh only 0.2 g more, which most wearers probably wonâ€™t be able to notice. However, there are innovations in the charging options and battery capacity. Not only do the Earbuds now charge with USB-C (USB-C fanatic Alex is happy), but the charging box now has 600 mAh instead of 300 mAh. Thus, you can probably charge the headphones a whole two times more. Once again, 7.2 mm dynamic drivers are used here, which we already had in the Redmi AirDots 2. So we can assume a similar sound here. However, we now also find a gaming mode here, which is supposed to significantly reduce the latency of the headphones. Thus, games and videos should have a much better sound-image synchronization. A completely new feature is the touch control of the headphones, which replaces the previous button control. You can use it to pause playback, accept/reject a call, activate a voice assistant or turn on the game mode. There is no mention of skipping tracks or changing the volume, but this was also not available in the predecessor. Additionally, there is now also a wear detection, which pauses the playback when you take off the headphones and accordingly also starts again when you put them on. A feature that is not really present in the low-price segment. A pop-up is also supposed to pop up on current MIUI devices, where you can see the current battery status of the headphones and charging box.

cat_seo_title: Xiaomi Earbuds Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech

full_description:
Xiaomi Air 2 SE TWS Bluetooth Basic Dual Earbuds

Xiaomi Air 2 SE TWS Bluetooth Basic Dual Earbuds The Xiaomi Air2 SE TWS Bluetooth Earphones can be used for about 5 hours on a single charge. The charging case can extend its usage time up to 20 hours. This headset has two built-in microphones and uses beamforming technology to eliminate background noise during a call. It has  Up to 20 hours of total battery life Crystal clear calls with dual-mic ENC Auto pair and auto-connect Smart in-ear detection feature Great sound with 14.2mm driver and AAC codec. Long battery life of 20 hours allows you to use it from morning till night Thanks to the power consumption control of the new chip, the earphones can be used for about 5 hours on a single full charge and 20 hours in combination with a charging case. The battery endurance allows you to listen to music all day long. In this TWS Bluetooth, 5.0 is used for the connection to your phone, the signal is transmitted simultaneously to each bud (which offers a more stable connection). In terms of acoustics, the Xiaomi Air2 SE TWS Bluetooth Earphones have a built-in 14.2mm large-size moving coil which supports the AAC codec. It has Touch controls as well as wear detection enabled, meaning that it will automatically pause your music when you take them off and then resume it once you put them back in. Moreover, there is deep integration with the companyâ€™s MIUI phones, showing the battery charge of each bud and the case. When you open the charging box, the headset connection interface will pop up. After connecting, you can check the power of the headset and the charging box. As an added bonus, this new earphone adopts a split true wireless design. This means that both earbuds work independently. There is no main earbud or master-slave relationship. With dual microphones, noise during calls is reduced, making sure there is no disturbance. Each earphone is equipped with two built-in high-sensitivity microphones, which use beamforming technology to eliminate the background noise during calls, allowing the other user to hear you clearly, even in noisy environments. Mi True Wireless Earphones 2 Basic features the MIUI Global user interface. When the charging case is opened, an interface for earphone connection pops up. After connecting, the earphones can be conveniently operated from your phone and you can view the battery levels of the earphones and the charging case. The dynamic driver with a 14.2mm large composite diaphragm is used to make the sound fuller and richer with a more natural feel, restoring more real texture and details. At the same time, AAC audio codec technology is supported to improve the audio quality and experience, providing users with clear-sounding audio. The half in-ear design fits the ear canal snugly for more comfort and stability inside and out. A single earphone only weighs 4.7 g. Xiaomi Air 2 SE TWS Bluetooth Basic Dual Earbuds offer a 03-month Warranty.

full_description:
Xiaomi Redmi Buds 3 Pro Noise Cancellation Wireless Earbuds

The Xiaomi Redmi Buds 3 Pro Wireless Earbuds provide a clear and comfortable listening experience. These Xiaomi Redmi Earbuds are equipped with a Bluetooth 5.2 wireless connection and a Type-C charging port for quick and convenient charging. The Xiaomi Redmi Buds 3 Pro Earbuds standby time is approx. 28 hours (noise cancellation off, 50% volume, AAC encoded), so you can enjoy your music and calls for a long time. They also have a music playback time of approx. 6 hours (noise cancellation off, 50% volume, AAC encoded) and a call duration of approx. 3 hours (noise cancellation off, 50% volume, AAC encoded). The Xiaomi Redmi Buds 3 Pro Noice Cancellation Earbuds have a single earbud battery rated capacity/power of 35mAh/0.13Wh and a charging case battery rated capacity/power of 470mAh/1.78Wh, enough power for the earbuds.

Hybrid Active Noise Cancellation

With feedback and feed-forward microphones, the Redmi Buds 3 Pro earbuds use dual active noise cancellation technology. They efficiently lessen surplus noise in the ear canal and cancel out background noise. There is a 35-dB depth of noise suppression. The Hybrid ANC efficiently muffles engine roars and other vibrating noises within the car or cabin when traveling by metro or airplane, resulting in a peaceful and comfortable journey. It successfully attenuates ambient noises when you're relaxing in a coffee shop, letting you enjoy your peaceful afternoon. They reduce surrounding noise in relatively calm spaces, such as workplaces and libraries, so you can have some alone time.

AI Scene

Based on usage patterns and ambient noise levels, the AI program evaluates the scene. Adapt the depth of noise suppression to the surrounding conditions. The Xiaomi Redmi Buds 3 Pro Earbuds have a neural network model-enabled call noise cancellation method that, paired with the three microphones, allows for precise voice recognition while successfully attenuating ambient background noise. This makes it possible to have uninterrupted, clear conversations in noisy settings.

9mm Composite Vibrating Diaphragm Coil

The Xiaomi Redmi Buds 3 Pro Wireless Earbuds 9mm composite vibrating diaphragm coil offers superb sound quality. A high-pitched sound is crisp and undistorted after being adjusted by a specialist from Xiaomi's in-house sound lab, and a low-pitched sound is rich and pure with more sophisticated sound quality.

Smart Dual-Device Connection

You may effortlessly transition between work and play by connecting the same set of earphones to two devices running different operating systems—Android, iOS, and Windows—at the same time. Open the earbud box next to your phone to initiate a Bluetooth pairing, or click the pop-up window immediately to take advantage of the new fast connection technique.

full_description:
Redmi Buds 4 Harry Potter Edition Bluetooth Wireless Earbuds

Redmi Buds 4 Harry Potter Edition Bluetooth Wireless Earbuds are a wonderful mix of elegance and technology that will elevate your listening experience. These earbuds produce rich and immersive sound quality thanks to a 10mm dynamic driver. The powerful 35dB noise cancellation, supplemented by AI intelligent adjustment, enables an uninterrupted aural trip, while the dual transparency mode allows you to keep in touch with your surroundings when necessary. These earphones give a fluid and lag-free connection thanks to their low latency and Bluetooth 5.2 compatibility. The convenience continues with an excellent 30-hour battery life backed by the charging case, ensuring uninterrupted use for a long period of time. With these Redmi Buds 4, you can embrace the magic of both the wizarding realm and cutting-edge audio technology.

10mm Dynamic Driver

The Redmi Buds 4 Harry Potter Edition has a 10mm dynamic driver for strong bass and enhanced acoustics. The Xiaomi Acoustic Lab has adjusted these earbuds to create a satisfying listening experience for people globally, immersing you in the depth of your favorite music.

Noise Cancellation for Calls

The Redmi Buds 4 Harry Potter Edition comes with a high-sensitivity microphone that efficiently reduces ambient noise, delivering excellent voice quality. These earphones allow for clear communication whether you're in a hectic area or on the go.

30-hour Ultra Long Battery Life

The Redmi Buds 4 Harry Potter Edition has a remarkable battery life, lasting up to 6 hours on a single charge. With the portable charging case, you can extend the battery life to an astounding 30 hours, letting you to listen to music all day and night without having to worry about recharging it regularly.

Smooth Gaming Experience with Low-Latency Mode

The Redmi Buds 4 Harry Potter Edition's Bluetooth 5.2 technology provides low-latency mode for a seamless gaming experience with outstanding accuracy. With less lag, you may enjoy intense gaming sessions while remaining in command with accurate and fast reactions.

Convenient Touch Control

Touch control operations make controlling your earphones simple. You may easily switch between settings, go to the next track, play/pause music, answer or reject calls, and more with light touches. The Redmi Buds 4 Harry Potter Edition provide total control from any location.

Google Fast Pair

The Redmi Buds 4 Harry Potter Edition support Google Fast Pair by simply opening the cover, allowing for simple Bluetooth pairing with your Android devices. With a single tap, you can connect and even locate your misplaced earbuds.

IP54 water-resistance

The Redmi Buds 4 Harry Potter Edition are water-resistant and have passed rigorous testing. Whether you're outside or at the gym, these earphones can keep up with your Harry Potter Edition lifestyle, delivering consistent performance even in the face of perspiration or light rain.
